summary: THE PANORAMIC SUNROOF HAS DEVELOPED A CRACK.  A SIMPLE GOOGLE SEARCH WILL SHOW THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THIS YEAR.  ACCORDING TO THE DEALER, THE CRACK WAS CAUSED BY AN IMPACT.  I AM NOT ABLE TO SEE ANY IMPACT DAMAGE.  THESE WINDOWS ARE SUPPOSED TO BE STRONGER THAN STEEL.  IF I HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT A 200LB GLASS ROOF COLLAPSING ON TOP OF ME, THAT NEEDS TO BE FIXED.  FOR REFUSES TO ACKNOWLEDGE THIS AS A DEFECT AND PUTS IT OFF ON THE CONSUMER.  A SAFETY RECALL SHOULD BE ISSUED.
